footer.companyInfo: Nomad Pays is a technology platform-aggregator for interaction between advertisers, users, and partners through a system of non-monetary bonus units (Points).
footer.disclaimer: The platform is NOT a bank, payment system, or financial institution. Nomad Pays does not conduct banking operations, does not provide financial services, and does not manage funds. The Points system is an internal accounting unit of the platform with no monetary equivalent, cannot be exchanged for money, and is used solely for receiving bonuses and rewards from platform partners.

whoDoesWhat.title: Who does what
whoDoesWhat.text: Nomad Pays operates as a technology platform that connects advertisers, users, and partners. Each participant has specific roles and responsibilities.

responsibilities.title: Responsibility and roles
responsibilities.advertisers: Advertisers: Create tasks, independently verify task completion, and approve or reject results. Advertisers are responsible for their tasks, content, and any payouts (if made through partners).
responsibilities.users: Users: Accept and complete tasks. Points are awarded only after advertiser confirmation.
responsibilities.partners: Partners: Voluntarily accept Points from users. Nomad Pays has no control over partner offerings or services.
responsibilities.nomadPays: Nomad Pays: Provides the technology platform. Does not verify tasks, does not guarantee payments, and does not mediate disputes.

important.title: Important points
important.item1: Task verification is performed by advertisers, not Nomad Pays
important.item2: Points are awarded only after advertiser confirmation
important.item3: Disputes are resolved outside the platform
important.item4: Nomad Pays does not participate in task verification or dispute resolution

notInvolved.title: Where the platform is not involved
notInvolved.text: Nomad Pays does not verify task completion, does not guarantee payments, does not store user deposits, does not mediate disputes, and does not control partner services or offerings.

whatAre.title: What Points are
whatAre.text1: Points are non-monetary bonus units used within the Nomad Pays platform. They represent a digital reward mechanism for completing tasks created by advertisers.
whatAre.text2: Points can be used voluntarily by partners who accept them in exchange for their goods or services. Nomad Pays does not control or guarantee the value of Points or their acceptance by partners.

finality.title: Finality of operations
finality.text: All operations with Points are final. Once Points are awarded, transferred, or used, these actions cannot be reversed.
